FuncDef: This command allows users to Enable/disable logging of tdcm alarms on the port.
CLIs: report-alarms [ nrdy ] [ mth ] [ mtl ] [ unlck ] [ tlim ] [ einv ] [ com ]
no report-alarms [ nrdy ] [ mth ] [ mtl ] [ unlck ] [ tlim ] [ einv ] [ com ]

ParaDef.Info: Reports module case temperature high faults.
Reports module case temperature low faults.
Reports thermal control temperature limit faults.
Reports Tdcm module communication failure faults.
